title: The CV workout
brief_description: Using three case studies, this program looks at producing the best CV to attract an interview. Identifying the right sort of CV to get an interview is an important skill. The three types of CV’s, functional, chronological and targeted with emphasis on selecting the best language and layout are linked to the case studies for more relevance. Accompanied by a Discussion Guide.
